summary: Welcome to Heimisgardr. This is a home complete with crafting stations and a personal house guard. It also features an excellent view of the Whiterun valley!
descriptionHtml:
* Player home above Whiterun valley.

* Forge, Smelter, Stone, Alchemy & Enchanting Tables.

* Personal House Guard (Eventually to include a main story arc.)

* Useable storage.

* Map Marker for instant travel to Heimisgardr just south of Whiterun!
author: VerdicAysen
